journal_metadata.full_title: The Journal of Open Source Software

titles.title: filesstrings: An R package for file and string manipulation

citation.unstructured_citation: R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing, R Core Team, R Foundation for Statistical Computing, Vienna, Austria, 2017, https://www.R-project.org/
RStudio: Integrated Development Environment for R, RStudio Team, RStudio, Inc., Boston, MA, 2016, http://www.rstudio.com/
readr: Read Rectangular Text Data, Wickham, Hadley and Hester, Jim and Francois, Romain, 2017, R package version 1.1.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=readr
tibble: Simple Data Frames, Wickham, Hadley and Francois, Romain and MÃ¼ller, Kirill, 2017, R package version 1.3.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=tibble
magrittr: A Forward-Pipe Operator for R, Bache, Stefan Milton and Wickham, Hadley, 2014, R package version 1.5, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=magrittr
ore: An R Interface to the Oniguruma Regular Expression Library, Clayden, Jon and based on Onigmo by K. Kosako and Takata, K., 2016, R package version 1.5.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ore
dplyr: A Grammar of Data Manipulation, Wickham, Hadley and Francois, Romain, 2016, R package version 0.5.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dplyr
matrixStats: Functions that Apply to Rows and Columns of Matrices (and to Vectors), Bengtsson, Henrik, 2017, R package version 0.52.1, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=matrixStats
stringr: Simple, Consistent Wrappers for Common String Operations, Wickham, Hadley, 2017, R package version 1.2.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=stringr
R package stringi: Character string processing facilities, Gagolewski, Marek and Tartanus, Bartek, 2016, http://www.gagolewski.com/software/stringi/
